comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: I think these men are vacuming the door, perhaps as a prelude to polishing the door. Note the hoses attached to the hand pieces they are wielding and the associated photographs: www.flickr.com/photos/nypl/3109282915/in/set-721576109675... www.flickr.com/photos/nypl/3109284623/in/set-721576109675...
